languages.text: The character's AGI and PER are increased in the next combat. This is a one-time bonus that disappears after the combat ends.

traits.locale_text: 在下一场战斗中，此角色的敏捷与感知提高。此加成效果为一次性效果，会在战斗结束之后消失。
